item.title: MGMT's Anti-Breakout Album: Congratulations
item.description: We are absolutely dead serious about music-making, and that’s what we want people to understand, that there’s no joke in it. We’re not intentionally trying to f*ck with people, we’re actually making this music that we love and we want people to hear it.1 ~ Ben Goldwasser You may not be familiar with MGMT, but anyone who had a pulse in the late 2000’s has most likely heard their work.
